detail.name: Vaseline Deep Moisture 48 HR Serum In Lotion For Dry Skin

details.description_text: Product DescriptionIntroducing the Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion in a generous 600ml bottle, a luxurious blend designed to replenish dry and rough skin with unparalleled comfort and hydration. Crafted with care, this ultra-light lotion is a true skincare staple suitable for both men and women, seamlessly integrating into your daily skincare routine.Enriched with a potent double-action formula featuring glycerine and Vaseline jelly, this moisturizer works tirelessly to restore your skin's lost moisture, leaving it velvety soft and supple. Its deep moisturizing properties and fast-absorbing formula shield your skin from the harsh elements of changing seasons, ensuring it remains radiant and timeless throughout the day.Experience the top benefits of this nourishing lotion, including 48 hours of continuous moisture, relief for dry and rough skin, a non-greasy feel, and its ability to penetrate all five layers of the epidermis. Formulated without harmful chemicals and free from any overpowering scents, it provides a truly indulgent skincare experience.Key ingredients like glycerin, Vaseline jelly, oats extract, and hyaluronic acid work synergistically to deliver optimal results, leaving your skin feeling rejuvenated and revitalized with every use.For best results, incorporate this lotion into your daily regimen by applying it generously and massaging until fully absorbed. Vaseline, with its rich heritage dating back to 1870, remains committed to promoting skin health for people of all skin types and backgrounds. With Vaseline, you can embrace life without constraints, confident in your skin's health and vitality.Made in India
